title: Address Support Response Time SLA Breach
description: Customer escalated 3 support tickets in Q4 2025 citing slow response times (avg 8 hours vs 4-hour SLA). Assign dedicated technical account manager and implement priority support queue. Failure to address will risk renewal.

title: Expand into IoT Division
description: Verizon's IoT division (separate budget) is growing 45% YoY and currently uses competitor solution. Introduce IoT-specific use cases and reference customers in telecom vertical. Potential for $280K incremental ARR.

title: Usage-Based Pricing Migration
description: Current flat-rate pricing creates budget predictability but customer is over-provisioned by 35%. Propose usage-based pricing that reduces immediate costs but aligns with their growth trajectory. This improves satisfaction and locks in long-term expansion.
